FirstSection.description: Crea sitios web con capacidad de respuesta en los que las tecnologías se unen a la creatividad

About.title: Sobre mí
About.paragraph1: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in Kyiv, Ukraine. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.
About.paragraph2: Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

Contacts.title: Contacts
Contacts.message: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
